snippet: The network hopes its new series about a contemporary Sherlock Holmes will get a lasting boost from being shown to the huge audience for the game.
abstract: The network hopes its new series about a contemporary Sherlock Holmes will get a lasting boost from being shown to the huge audience for the game.

headline.main: CBS Picks 'Elementary' for Coveted Spot After Super Bowl
headline.print_headline: CBS Picks ‘Elementary’ To Follow Super Bowl
